flags.name: --price-per-unit
flags.validation: Must be greater than 0 when provided.

flags.name: --end-on
flags.validation: Must be greater than start-on when provided.

flags.name: --resource-type
flags.validation: Allowed values: Laborer, Equipment. Must be provided with --resource-id.

flags.name: --resource-classification-type
flags.validation: Allowed values: LaborClassification, EquipmentClassification. Must be provided with --resource-classification-id.

flags.name: --craft-class
flags.validation: Must share the same broker when provided.

permissions: Admin users can update crew rates. Non-admin users can update crew rates only for brokers they are a member of.
validation_notes: <id> argument is required. At least one attribute or relationship must be provided. --is-active must be true or false when provided. --resource-type and --resource-id must be provided together when either is set. --resource-classification-type and --resource-classification-id must be provided together when either is set. --resource-type expects Laborer or Equipment. --resource-classification-type expects LaborClassification or EquipmentClassification. price_per_unit must be greater than 0 when provided. end_on must be greater than start_on when provided. Resource must belong to the specified resource classification when both are provided. Active crew rates cannot overlap for the same broker and resource classification (and resource when specified). At least one of resource classification, resource, or craft class must be present on the record. If craft class is provided, it must share the same broker.
